sources.title: Dance Hall Racket
sources.description: A gangster (Timothy Farrell) who operates a sleazy dance hall uses a sadistic bodyguard (Lenny Bruce) to keep his girls afraid and his customers in line.

sources.title: DOUBLE FEATURE HELL (an evening with Phil Tucker)
sources.description: The odyssey begins with coming attractions and a newsreel, followed by Phil Tucker's daring expose of taxi dance joints, "Dance Hall Racket." Then after a fascinating intermission featurette on rubber boots, prepare to be shocked by another mind-bending Phil Tucker expose, "Broadway Jungle," which takes place in Hollywood. No death threats please.

metadata.Plot: A merchant marine seaman is found murdered and suspicion falls upon the operator of a dime-a-dance honky tonk joint. A federal undercover agent is planted in the place to gather evidence, and he soon learns that the dive is only a cover-up for diamond-smuggling activities, and that one of the operation's henchmen, who is handy with a switch-blade knife, is the killer. Before they can be arrested, the henchman kills his boss and is shot while trying to escape.
metadata.Actors: Timothy Farrell, Lenny Bruce, Bernie Jones
